channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16854] Refactor the org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Action
item.description:
a) According to the previous comments, the Action doesn’t apply the generic.
b) Action implements the Comparable<R>, but the Action#compareTo cast the object to Action.
For reasons outlined above, we should refactor the Action.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
